item.title: Binary Search
item.description: 二分查找 二分查找模版 def binary_search(arr, target): if not arr: return -1 left = 0 right = len(arr) - 1 while left <= right: mid = left + ((right - left)>>1) pivot = arr[mid] if pivot < target: left = mid + 1 elif pivot > target: right = mid - 1 else pass # ??? ret = -1 # ??? return ret 二
